{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3039623,"name":"Becca","username":"rjacobson","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/r/a3d4f5/{size}.png","created_at":"2022-04-08T05:09:43.642Z","cooked":"

Our team recently imaged the newest Limelight update (2022.2.3) and everything seemed fine at first. We spent a few hours tuning, then called it a day. Things still worked fine for a while today, until we deployed the code again. We had no done this up until this point. Now, the Limelight turns on but does not seem to be communicating with the RoboRIO. It powers up fine and we are able to see it through limelight.local:5801 (we are using an automatic/dynamic IP), however, we are not receiving any values to the Dashboard. Additionally, we have a line in the code that turns the LEDs off while disabled (setting the LED mode to 1). This had been working up until now.

We tried reverting to the old version by imaging 2022.2.2 but the problem persisted.
We were also in the process of changing to a static IP before leaving for the day.

If anyone knows of other possible fixes please let me know as soon as possible!
